Divisions.Details:
Vision
 To be a centre of excellence in applied research and innovation in mathematics and mathematical sciences and to highly contribute to the quality of teaching of mathematics.

Vision
 To be a lead­ing Centre of Excel­lence in the uses of ICT for development.

Vision
To become a leading outcome driven entrepreneurial research centre by translating our excellence into major contribution to greater adaptation and penetration of renewable energy and energy efficiency.

Vision
SGC seeks to promote good governance in the public, private and civic sectors of the Eastern African region by carrying out research and analysis on governance issues.

Vision
A leader in innovative health research for development.

Vision
To create a platform for Strathmore to become a leading outcome-driven university providing high quality graduate education and research.

Vision
The Vision of the School of Humanities is to enhance the general vision of the university through the teaching of the humanities.

Vision
Strathmore Law School’s vision is to be a centre renowned for excellence in legal education and research, guided by a commitment to pursue justice, to cultivate lawyers of professional and moral competence.

Vision
We aspire to promote integration between academic research and industry in order to promote business growth in an atmosphere of high ethical and professional performance.
